programmes.show_description: Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off those mobile phones!

programmes.show_name: The Heritage Chart with Mike Read
programmes.show_description: Another episode of the Heritage Chart - new music by heritage acts! With Mike Read.
Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off those mobile phones!
Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights and iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!
2nd November 1987 saw the release of one of the best selling albums of all time - George Michael's Faith. And here's every video from the album - in order!
Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights and iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!
Through the decade, 40 hit songs from famous acts of the '80s - but not a single one made the top 10! Not everything went right for the A-List!
In order - Mark Goodier's 11-hour journey through the decade's biggest number 1 songs, from ABBA and Adam Ant to Wham!, Madonna, Rick Astley and Kylie Minogue.
A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!
50 love songs - a lesson from the '70s followed by another from the '80s! Including Debby Boone, Hot Chocolate, Bette Midler, Neil Diamond and Roberta Flack.
A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!
From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.
12 amazing videos from Tina's big-haired golden period 1983-1995. Including Let's Stay Together, What's Love Got To Do With It, Steamy Windows, Goldeneye and The Best.
A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Another session of dodgy hair-don'ts and colourful coiffures from the decade that laid it on large! Including Boy George, Janet Jackson, Bon Jovi, Barbara Dickson and Five Star.
A cavalcade of clothing calamities and 'interesting choices' from superstars including Bowie, Madonna, Adam Ant, Bananarama, Queen, Wham, Five Star and maybe even Limahl himself!
A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
From shoulder pads and chunky pullovers to dodgy beards, suspect eyeshadow and hoop earrings - the '80s were a juggernaut of excess! Here are 40 videos which defined the era.
A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.
Perhaps better known for bigger hits - all of these tracks from famous acts surely deserve another outing! You'll not have heard most of these songs for ages!
